name: Telegram Theme
summary: An ATTHEME file contains a theme used by the Android version of the Telegram messaging app. It stores settings in a plain text format that define the visual appearance of the Telegram interface, such as colors for backgrounds, text, buttons, and other user interface ( UI ) elements. ATTHEME files allow users to customize how Telegram looks on their Android devices, giving the app a different aesthetic from the default appearance.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: ATTHEME file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.98
